title: Simple 4-Step Flow
description: No corporate red tape. Just fast, clear, and effective:

items.title: You Reach Out
items.description: Shoot me a message with your idea. I reply in hours, not days.

items.title: We Lock Scope
items.description: Quick chat or call. We nail down exactly what’s needed. No scope creep, no confusion.

items.title: I Build It
items.description: I go heads-down and ship. You get progress updates as I build.

items.title: You Get It + Docs
items.description: Backend delivered. Full docs included so your team can run with it instantly.
